availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Michael Fishback Jr. (Jefferson County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Michael Fishback Sr. Married to Susan Frances Brenthinger Fishback in Hamilton County, Ohio, on September 28, 1858. Married to Mary A. Weatherly Fishback in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on January 26, 1865. Resident in Jefferson County in 1850. Farmer in Jefferson County in 1860. Farmer in Jefferson County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, District 1, p. 181B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, District 2, p. 1005.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville Ward 1, p. 14B.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Jefferson County, KY, June1863, p. 165.
Ohio Marriage Records, 1774-1993, Hamilton County Marriages, Film #000344473, p. 406.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Jefferson County Marriages, Film #000482710, p. 104-5.
"Michael Fishback (1838-1909)," Find A Grave, Memorial #75412517, accessed May 18, 2022, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/75412517.
